actor_awards.notes: Renowned for his portrayal of Larry Talbot (The Wolf Man) in five films.

filmography.title: Of Mice and Men
filmography.role_description: A mentally disabled itinerant worker with immense strength who relies on his friend George for guidance; Chaney's critical breakthrough.
filmography.plot: Two migrant workers, one intelligent and the other mentally disabled, dream of owning their own farm during the Great Depression.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: One Million B.C.
filmography.role_description: The fierce, scarred leader of the Rock Tribe in this prehistoric spectacle.
filmography.plot: A caveman banished from his tribe falls in love with a woman from a gentler tribe, trying to unite them against dinosaurs.

filmography.title: North West Mounted Police
filmography.role_description: A Métis rebel involved in the North-West Rebellion in this Cecil B. DeMille Technicolor epic.
filmography.plot: A Texas Ranger joins forces with the Royal Canadian Mounted Police to stop a rebellion and catch a murderer.

filmography.title: Man Made Monster
filmography.role_description: A carnival performer who survives a bus crash due to his immunity to electricity, only to be experimented on by a mad scientist.
filmography.plot: A mad scientist turns a man who is immune to electricity into an electrically charged killer.

filmography.title: Billy the Kid
filmography.role_description: A loyal friend to the titular outlaw in this Technicolor western.
filmography.plot: A childhood friend of Pat Garrett becomes a notorious outlaw, forcing the lawman to hunt him down.

filmography.title: The Wolf Man
filmography.role_description: A man bitten by a werewolf who is cursed to transform into a beast under the full moon; his signature role.
filmography.plot: A practical man returns to his homeland, is attacked by a creature of folklore, and infected with a horrific disease.

filmography.title: The Ghost of Frankenstein
filmography.role_description: Taking over the role from Boris Karloff, Chaney plays the Monster as he is manipulated by the envious Ygor.
filmography.plot: Ygor resurrects Frankenstein's Monster and brings him to the original doctor's second son for help.

filmography.title: The Mummy's Tomb
filmography.role_description: Chaney takes over the role of the bandaged ancient Egyptian mummy, seeking revenge in America.
filmography.plot: A high priest travels to America with the living mummy Kharis to kill the members of the expedition who desecrated the tomb.

filmography.title: Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man
filmography.role_description: Talbot seeks a cure for his lycanthropy and uncovers the frozen Frankenstein Monster.
filmography.plot: Larry Talbot travels to Castle Frankenstein to find a cure, where he finds the Monster frozen in ice.

filmography.title: Son of Dracula
filmography.role_description: The vampire Count arrives in the American South, assuming the name 'Alucard' to blend in.
filmography.plot: Count Dracula travels to New Orleans under an alias and marries a morbid young woman to gain her plantation.

filmography.title: Calling Dr. Death
filmography.role_description: A neurologist who uses hypnosis to solve the murder of his unfaithful wife in the first of the 'Inner Sanctum' mysteries.
filmography.plot: A doctor is unsure if he killed his wife during a blackout, so he uses hypnosis to find the truth.

filmography.title: Cobra Woman
filmography.role_description: A mute servant on a tropical island in this Technicolor camp classic.
filmography.plot: A woman discovers she has a twin sister who rules a Cobra cult on a forbidden island.

filmography.title: Weird Woman
filmography.role_description: A rational sociology professor whose wife uses voodoo practices to protect him from jealous rivals.
filmography.plot: A professor marries a woman raised in the jungle who believes in voodoo, leading to strange occurrences on campus.

filmography.title: Dead Man's Eyes
filmography.role_description: An artist blinded by a jealous woman who is offered a cornea transplant from a murder victim.
filmography.plot: A blinded artist is accused of murdering his future father-in-law to obtain his eyes for a transplant.

filmography.title: The Mummy's Ghost
filmography.role_description: The living mummy continues his quest for his lost princess, who has been reincarnated as a college student.
filmography.plot: An Egyptian high priest travels to America to reclaim the bodies of the Princess Ananka and her guardian mummy, Kharis.

filmography.title: House of Frankenstein
filmography.role_description: Talbot is revived by a mad scientist and seeks death to end his curse, sharing the screen with Dracula and the Monster.
filmography.plot: A mad scientist escapes prison and revives Dracula, the Wolf Man, and the Frankenstein Monster to exact revenge on his enemies.

filmography.title: Strange Confession
filmography.role_description: A chemist who takes revenge on an unscrupulous boss who stole his formula and caused a tragedy.
filmography.plot: A scientist is exploited by his greedy boss, leading to a tragic confrontation.

filmography.title: House of Dracula
filmography.role_description: Talbot seeks a cure for his condition from a doctor who is also treating Count Dracula.
filmography.plot: Dracula and the Wolf Man seek cures for their afflictions from a scientist, who also discovers the Frankenstein Monster.

filmography.title: My Favorite Brunette
filmography.role_description: A dim-witted henchman who plays a memorable role in this Bob Hope film noir parody.
filmography.plot: A baby photographer dreaming of being a private eye gets mixed up in a murder mystery involving a baron and a secret map.

filmography.title: Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein
filmography.role_description: The only actor to play a classic monster straight in this comedy, trying to stop Dracula from reviving the Monster.
filmography.plot: Two hapless freight handlers find themselves encountering Dracula, the Frankenstein Monster, and the Wolf Man.

filmography.title: High Noon
filmography.role_description: A retired, arthritic former marshal who advises Gary Cooper but refuses to help him fight.
filmography.plot: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon.

filmography.title: Springfield Rifle
filmography.role_description: A rugged horse thief who becomes a key antagonist in this Civil War espionage western.
filmography.plot: A Union officer goes undercover to stop a Confederate spy ring that is stealing horses.

filmography.title: The Black Castle
filmography.role_description: A brutish, scarred retainer in a gothic castle, protecting his master's dark secrets.
filmography.plot: A man investigates the disappearance of two of his friends at the castle of a sinister Austrian count.

filmography.title: Big House, U.S.A.
filmography.role_description: A tough convict involved in a brutal prison escape and kidnapping scheme.
filmography.plot: A kidnapper is sent to prison where he is forced by other inmates to lead them to the ransom money.

filmography.title: The Indestructible Man
filmography.role_description: A mute, executed criminal brought back to life by science, seeking revenge on those who double-crossed him.
filmography.plot: An executed criminal is brought back to life by a scientist and goes on a rampage to kill the men who double-crossed him.

filmography.title: The Defiant Ones
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic former convict who helps the chained fugitives despite the risk to himself.
filmography.plot: Two escaped convicts, one white and one black, are shackled together and must learn to get along in order to elude capture.

filmography.title: The Haunted Palace
filmography.role_description: The caretaker of a cursed estate and a warlock's familiar, aiding in the possession of Vincent Price's character.
filmography.plot: A man arrives in a New England town to claim his family castle, only to find it inhabited by mutants and the spirit of his warlock ancestor.

filmography.title: Spider Baby
filmography.role_description: The gentle, devoted chauffeur and guardian to a family of siblings with a degenerative condition that makes them homicidal.
filmography.plot: A chauffeur protects three orphaned siblings who suffer from a genetic disorder that causes them to regress into a feral state.
